Functions
Math Utility Functions
utils

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides mathematical utility functions for embedded applications on Ambiq Micro devices. It enables efficient mathematical operations, data manipulation, and computational support for system operations. The utilities support optimized implementations of common math functions.

Key Features

  1. Fast Math: Optimized mathematical operations.
  2. Data Manipulation: Efficient data handling functions.
  3. Fixed-point: Fixed-point arithmetic support.
  4. Precision Control: Configurable computation accuracy.
  5. Performance: Optimized for embedded systems.

Functionality

  • Perform mathematical calculations
  • Handle data conversions
  • Support fixed-point operations
  • Optimize computational tasks
  • Manage precision requirements

Usage

  1. Use math functions as needed
  2. Select appropriate precision
  3. Handle data conversions
  4. Monitor performance impact

Configuration

  • Set precision requirements
  • Configure optimization levels
  • Define data formats
  • Set performance targets

Functions

uint8_t am_util_math_bcd_to_dec (uint8_t ui8BCDByte)
 Converts a Binary Coded Decimal (BCD) byte to its Decimal form.
 
uint8_t am_util_math_dec_to_bcd (uint8_t ui8DecimalByte)
 Converts a Decimal byte to its Binary Coded Decimal (BCD) form.
 

Function Documentation

◆ am_util_math_bcd_to_dec()

uint8_t am_util_math_bcd_to_dec ( uint8_t ui8BCDByte)

Converts a Binary Coded Decimal (BCD) byte to its Decimal form.

Parameters
ui8BCDByteis a BCD byte.

This function is useful when working with RTC's as they tend to be in BCD format.

Returns
the BCD byte converted to Decimal

◆ am_util_math_dec_to_bcd()

uint8_t am_util_math_dec_to_bcd ( uint8_t ui8DecimalByte)

Converts a Decimal byte to its Binary Coded Decimal (BCD) form.

Parameters
ui8DecimalByteis a Decimal byte.

This function is useful when working with RTC's as they tend to be in BCD format.

Returns
the Decimal byte converted to BCD.
